detail_desc: Set with a top and trousers in a cotton knit. Top with a round, roll-edge neckline, buttons at the back on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with a ribbed drawstring waist and ribbing at the hems.

Slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), and a zip fly and button. Coin pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey. Tops with short sleeves and a press-stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 1½-4Y). Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Shell trousers in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Adjustable elasticated waist, a reflective strip on one leg and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Joggers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. T-shirt in organic slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a round neck, opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with ties at the cuffs.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with small frills at the side of the hems.

Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Strapless balconette bras in microfibre and mesh with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Silicone trim and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Mesh dress with a glitter print, wide shoulder straps and a decorative wrapover at the top. Press-studs and a detachable bow at the back, a seam at the top and a pleated skirt with a double lining for extra width. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Rings in various designs made from recycled zinc.
V-neck top in a patterned weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and crossover frills at the front.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a fine-knit wool and cotton blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front and welt front pockets. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short, straight-cut, quilted coat in a patterned viscose weave with a yoke at the back and on the shoulders. Long, wide sleeves with a seam at the cuffs, a concealed drawstring at the waist and no fasteners. Light padding.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Calf-length dress in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Sewn-in wrapover at the front and a seam at the waist with ties at one side.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a tie detail at the front, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined at the top.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit and pair of shorts with straps in an organic cotton blend. Bodysuit in soft jersey with buttons at the top, press-studs at the crotch and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves. Shorts in an airy textured weave with patch front pockets, sewn-in turn-ups at the hems and straps that cross at the back and button at the front.
Tops in soft, printed cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves and press-studs at the back of one shoulder.
Ankle-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a small V-neck and spaghetti shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and slits in the sides.
Jumper in soft, lace-knit cotton with long, trumpet sleeves. Scalloped edge at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Brazilian briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Short, A-line skirt in sturdy cotton twill. High waist with belt loops, patch front pockets with a flap, a zip at the back and short slits in the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist, high-cut legs and cutaway coverage at the back.

Small bag in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a zip at the top and an adjustable strap with a metal buckle. The bag can be worn around the waist or over the shoulder. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Fitted top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front.
Shopper in braided plastic tape with two handles at the top. Unlined. Depth 16 cm. Height 30 cm. Width 51 cm.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Sleeveless top in soft organic cotton jersey with a tie detail at the hem.

Dungarees in soft, organic cotton twill with frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back and fasten at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist and heart-shaped patch front pockets. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and legs, and ribbed hems.
Calf-length skirt in soft, patterned viscose jersey. High waist with covered elastication, and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired bras in microfibre with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Pre-tied bow tie in woven fabric with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Width 10 cm.
Shorts in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket.
Long jacket in a textured weave with 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, pockets at the front and no buttons. Unlined.
Bolero in a loose cotton knit with 3/4-length trumpet sleeves and a ribbed edge around the opening. No fasteners.
Short jersey dress with a sequined mesh over layer. V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long, sequined fringes at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fabric cap with a motif. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a decorative lace trim and bow at the top, narrow shoulder straps, elastication around the hems and press-studs at the crotch.

Sturdy running backpack with a padded, mesh-covered back and padded, shaped shoulder straps that can be held together by an adjustable chest strap with a plastic fastener. The chest strap has a slide fastener for easy height adjustment. Wider, adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener, one large compartment with an earphone outlet, a mesh side compartment and one zipped inner compartment. Elastic hanger at the top. Lined. Size 19x42 cm.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a gathered, elasticated frill around the neckline and armholes.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Small metal hair clips in various glittery and shimmering designs. Length of hair clips 4 cm.

Fully lined bikini top. Triangular cups with removable inserts and cut-out sections at the bottom, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways at the back. No fasteners.
Lace balconette bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Narrow, adjustable, detachable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket, low rise, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Pull-on shorts in supersoft stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side and back pockets, flap leg pockets and raw-edge hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, medium coverage at the back and laser-cut, scalloped edges.
Knee-length skirt in softly draping satin with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons down the front and fake pockets. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft ribbed cotton jersey with contrasting colour ribbing. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft cotton with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length skirt woven in a sturdy linen and cotton blend with buttons down the front, side pockets and a slit at the back. Unlined.
Pull-on trousers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and welt back pockets. Tapered legs with decorative seams and elasticated hems.
Fitted,V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves, a seam below the bust and a twisted detail at the front to create a gently draped effect.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy cotton weave with a decorative pompom trim and embroidery. V-neck, round, spaghetti shoulder straps, a seam at the hips and a flared skirt. Lined.
Playsuit in a crêpe weave with a shawl collar and wrapover front with concealed buttons that covers the short legs. Detachable tie belt with D-rings at the waist, and long sleeves. Partly lined.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a deep neckline at the front and long sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. One pair of hoops and three pairs with pendants. Length from 2.7 cm to 8 cm.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with long sleeves and a decorative hole pattern. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. Seamless.
Earrings with a round, slightly curved metal disc at the top and a large, tear-shaped resin pendant. Length 6.5 cm.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive appliqué on the front and jersey-lined, wrapover hood. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short jumper in a sturdy knit with low dropped shoulders, wide, tapered sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and a V-neck with gathers.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 40x170 cm.
Blouse in airy fabric with a gathered, elasticated boat neck, long, wide raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a tie detail at the hem.
